PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1990-06181990-03-290ISTC,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisAuthority to enter into a supplementary Agreement (No. 2) with the Gov't of Quebec which will amend the HELICOPTER ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT which provided financial assistance to the Bell Helicopter Division of Textron Canada Ltd. for the establishment of a helicopter production facility, so that the funding may be reallocated towards the development of the Bell 230 helicopter model.
Attachments
